document_name: Vessel Pollution and Dangerous Chemicals Regulations (SOR/2012-69)
document_description: This document regulates vessel pollution under the Canada Shipping Act of 2001. The document includes 1) rules on certification of GHG emissions for new diesel engines 2) a disposition on granting International Energy Efficiency Certificates to vessels that meet requirements set underÂ chapter 4 of Annex VI to MARPOL.
